scripts.clean-test: find ./infrastructure/test -name '*.d.ts' -type f -delete && find ./infrastructure/test -name '*.js' -type f -delete && rm -rf coverage/ && rm -rf report/
scripts.clean-services: cd services && mvn clean -s settings.xml && cd ..
scripts.package-services: cd services && mvn clean install -s settings.xml && cd ..
scripts.test-services: cd services && mvn clean test -s settings.xml && cd ..
scripts.clean-handlers: cd handlers && mvn clean -s settings.xml && cd ..
scripts.package-handlers: cd handlers && mvn clean package -s settings.xml && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean-lib && npm run clean-bin && npm run clean-test && npm run clean-definitions && npm run clean-services && npm run clean-handlers
scripts.setup: npm ci && npm run package-services && npm run package-handlers
